name: Khachitri!!
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: May the positive vibe and cheerfulness always be with you! ;)
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Enjoy every special moment in your life!I made this last year, but didn't gain courage to send it to you
replayText: To know what I did this year, click here!!
